ResourceHeader.ResourceName: RPI Instrument Page and Data Repository at UML
ResourceHeader.Description: The RPI repository at University of Massachusetts Lowell is a relational database holding full telemetry, ephemeris, geospace model, derived and expert annotation data products for the Radio Plasma Imager instrument on IMAGE spacecraft. Public access to the RPI-UML resource is arranged vis BinBrowser software available at http://umlcar.uml.edu/rpi.html

InformationURL.Name: Web page
InformationURL.Description: Web page for RPI Instrument on IMAGE
